name: Aron's Gift
summary: Aron's Gift is an original action-adventure role-playing game. Explore a unique hand-painted world filled with character and bountiful secrets.
storyline: Delve into the early days of Bryn, when the world was old and full of inexplicable secrets. As a young boy, Aron obtains the unique ability to change the world around him. Spawn relationships with unimaginable characters, and uncover the truth of this clandestine realm.
